pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces a change in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following change in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Arun Thangaraj, currently Assistant Deputy Minister and Chief Financial Officer, Corporate Planning, Finance and Information Technology, Global Affairs Canada, becomes Associate Deputy Minister of Transport, effective July 6, 2020.

Biographical note

  • Arun Thangaraj
